ðŸ“– Summary: The 'bubbles' repository provides a simple, drop-in screensaver script for websites. It displays floating bubbles when a page is idle, offering a visually engaging way to prevent screen burn-in or simply add a touch of whimsy. The script is configurable with parameters to adjust the delay, speed, size, and frequency of the bubbles.
